content.raw:
Excellent, if it doesn't regress it merges. Thanks so much for testing!

I replaced the redundant if statements with a dict lookup. Means that we're not repeating ourselves with the error checking, but also that if an invalid value creeps in somehow there will still be an error immediately rather than the instance  variable just not getting set, which would be harder to debug.

Excellent, if it doesn't regress it merges. Thanks so much for testing!

I replaced the redundant if statements with a dict lookup. Means that we're not repeating ourselves with the error checking, but also that if an invalid value creeps in somehow there will still be an error immediately rather than the instance variable just not getting set, which would be harder to debug.
